oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hatch-Gray Printing Envelope with Notes
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hatch-Gray Printing; Offset printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color (blue and red on white) envelope with the Hatch - Gray Printing name and address printed in the top left corner. The envelope was probably printed on the offset press. There are handwritten notes on the envelope referring to an order placed by Scottie Spicer for 50 jumbos (half sheets).
